name: 蔡逸萍
objective: This course intends to enhance students’ reading, speaking and listening abilities by using English news reports from newspapers, news magazines, global news broadcasters and news websites. It will help students enrich their vocabulary and acquire key English expressions and sentence patterns used in politics, arts, entertainment, science & technology, sports, business and health. Additionally, diverse forms of activities will be arranged to enable students to develop effective language skills.
scorePolicy:
20% In-class Midterm 
20% Campus-wide English Proficiency Test （Midterm)
20% In-class Final
40% Continual assessments: attendance, class participation and performance, oral presentation, etc..
